thread.title: Quick tomato soup recipe

author: Xanthe Clay
title: Quick tomato soup recipe
text: The chilli sauce is optional, but often popular with even small children. SERVES Makes four little cupfuls or two bowlfuls INGREDIENTS 1 tbsp butter 1 clove garlic 400g tin of tomatoes 1 tbsp tomato purée A shake of sweet chilli sauce (optional) Nutmeg (optional) METHOD Melt the butter in a small pan and crush in the garlic. Allow to cook gently for a few seconds, then tip the tomatoes into the pan, along with the tomato purée, about 8 fl oz/225ml water, and shake in some chilli sauce. As it heats, whizz it with a hand blender until smooth. Don’t let the mixture boil if you can avoid it. Season lightly with a grating of nutmeg.
